definitions.title: n.pr.flum.
definitions.body: on border of Egypt, prob. E. branch of Nile;—´[[הַשּׁ]]: Jos 13:3, [[מִחְרַיִם]] ´[[שׁ]]: 1Ch 13:5; clearly = Nile, [[זֶרַע שִׁחׂר]] Is 23:3 (‖[[יְאוֹר קְחִיר ]]), [[מֵי שִׁחוֹר]] Je 2:18; cf. Dl:Pa 311 Wilson:Hast. DB SHIHOR (usu. derived from I. [[שׁחר]], as black water, but doubtful). p.1007
